name: Garbanzo Bean Soup
author: JENYRUT
summary: This is a recipe that I picked up in Italy a few years ago.  Being that I'm not a soup fan, I was somewhat hesitant...  but this thick and hearty soup quickly won my praise.  It will quickly become a favorite recipe!
ingredients: 1 (14.5 ounce) can peeled and diced tomatoes
directions: Combine the tomatoes, olive oil and 1 1/2 cans of the beans in a large saucepan
Puree the remaining 1/2 can of garbanzo beans using a blender or food processor, and stir into the saucepan
Place the sprigs of rosemary into the pan without breaking off the leaves
The sprigs will be removed before serving
Add acini de pepe pasta and simmer until pasta is soft, stirring gently to prevent sticking
Remove rosemary, and season with salt and pepper
